data.name: GET-RealTimeTripUpdates

tasks.name: AddJobToDBQ
tasks.description: This activity executes insert on a MySQL database

input.InsertStatement: INSERT INTO gtfsbusposctrl (ReferenceID, JobDate, Status) values (?ReferenceID, ?JobDate, ?Status);
